title: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
description: Bug 3622 - New Package Wizard has confusing message
OB: When invoking the New Java Package feature, a message is displayed at the top stating 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists.' This message appears even when the package name field is empty.
EB: The message 'A folder corresponding to the package name already exists' should not appear when the package name field is empty. This message is unnecessary and confusing.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Create a new Java Project.
2. Select the project.
3. Open the New Package Wizard.
